"The Predacons can't be trusted," warns Gatara.  "And I'd sooner die 
than side with the Tripredacus forces.  That leaves the Maximals."

"Indeed.  Shall me make them an offer?" Devilcat invites, extending 
his hand.  One by one, the other Rogues place their hands on his, 
forming a loose circle.  (There's room for Yggdrasil to join, if he 
wants.)

"Our greatest strength has always been unity.  I'm glad to see that 
still holds true." Devilcat says with a smile.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
<wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: So the situation is this: These Tripredacus guys seem to 
be
> very well equipped and experienced too. Attacking their ship full
> frontal would only get you killed. You might try going for subtlety,
> but their defence seems good, so it would be risky. There's always
> time for an alliance, but with who, that remains to be seen. The
> decision is yours. What will you do?
